message: This proposal divides the money equally, ensuring a fair share for both players.
You'll get a small share, but I'll give you a chance to get more in the next rounds.
I propose we split the money in a 5:5 ratio, aiming for an equitable distribution considering the decreasing value of money with each round.
You'll get a tiny share, but I'll take most of the remaining money, it's my turn now.
I believe in fairness and equality. This proposal offers us both equal shares, ensuring mutual benefit.
